articles.title: Revathy Suryanarayana
articles.contents: I am an Assistant Professor in the Peter O’Donnell Jr. School of Public Health at The University of Texas Southwestern Medical Center. My areas of research include health economics, health policy, labor economics, and the economics of crime.

articles.title: Policy Writing
articles.contents:
Fear or knowledge: The impact of graphic cigarette warnings on tobacco product choices
VoxEU Column, with Donald Kenkel, Alan Mathios, Grace Phillips, Hua Wang, Sen Zeng. 23 September, 2023
Social health insurance schemes
India Public Finance and Policy Report, Oxford University Press, 2020, with Arjun Bedi, Arpita Chakraborty, Sisir Debnath, Anagaw Derseh Mebratie, Pradeep Panda, E. van de Poel, Wameq Raza, Frans Rutten, Zemzem Shigute, Robert Sparrow, Revathy Suryanarayana and Getnet Alemu Zewdu. Edited by J. Jalan, S. Marjit and S. Santra.
Designing India’s national healthcare protection: Challenges and opportunities
Ideas for India, August 27, 2018, with Tarun Jain, Sisir Debnath and Dibya Mishra.
Common tongue? How mother tongue instruction influences education
Ideas for India, February 27, 2017, with Tarun Jain.
